params._action: The World ID Action (from Developer Portal)
params._appId: The World ID App ID (from Developer Portal)
params._worldId: The address of the WorldIDRouter that will verify the proofs

getCandidateWinCount(uint256).details: NOTE: This function has limited utility in current implementation. Simple pairwise win counting doesn't provide meaningful election analysis. Better to use getFullComparisonMatrix() and perform sophisticated analysis off-chain. Kept for backward compatibility but consider using off-chain calculations instead.

getCondorcetWinner().details: DEPRECATED: This function's Condorcet calculation is fundamentally flawed. The algorithm implementation is incorrect and should NOT be used for actual winner determination. Condorcet winner calculation should be performed off-chain using the pairwise comparison matrix. This function exists only as a reminder of the flawed approach - DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION. Use getFullComparisonMatrix() instead and calculate Condorcet winner off-chain.

updateRanking(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Update user's ranking with World ID ZK proof verification

params.newRanking: Array of RankingEntry structs with tie information
params.nullifierHash: The nullifier hash for this proof, preventing double signaling (returned by the IDKit widget)
params.proof: The zero-knowledge proof that demonstrates the claimer is registered with World ID (returned by the IDKit widget)
params.root: The root (returned by the IDKit widget)
params.signal: The user's wallet address (cannot be tampered with)
